title: Fake News and Conspiracy Theories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/28/17
itunes:title: Fake News and Conspiracy Theories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/28/17
description:
George Noory and guest Jon Rappoport discuss the rise of fake news in the mainstream media, and advice on ways to not be manipulated by the news.
